ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen lemonade concentrate
des: "This uses lemonade concentrate plus real fruit - lemons, limes, oranges, and grapefruit. It is soooo good."
ins: Into a gallon pitcher, empty both cans of lemonade concentrate. Place the sliced lemon, lime, grapefruit and orange in the pitcher. Stir in water until pitcher is full. Chill in refrigerator.
